LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBasicRecipe.label: make basic plastic
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBasicRecipe.description: Lightweight bio-plastic from plant materials. Basic-grade material suitable for simple furniture and structures.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIndustrialRecipe.label: make industrial plastic
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIndustrialRecipe.description: Advanced bio-plastic with enhanced durability. Industrial-grade material for high-quality furniture and robust structures.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBioSteelRecipe.label: make plastic Bio-Steel
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticBioSteelRecipe.description: Advanced Plastic bio-engineered steel created by reinforcing plant-based polymers with metallic compounds. While not as strong as spacer-tech materials, it offers an excellent balance of durability and sustainability for colonial construction.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticFiberRecipe.label: make plastic fiber
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticFiberRecipe.description: Synthetic textile fiber from bio-plastic. Suitable for clothing production and textile crafting.
LanguageData.RSF_ChemfuelFromPlasticRecipe.label: make chemfuel from plastic
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIncendiaryRecipe.label: make incendiary plastic
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIncendiaryRecipe.description: Bio-plastic infused with volatile compounds. Extremely flammable construction material for tactical applications. Handle with care.
LanguageData.RSF_PlasticIncendiaryRecipe.jobString: converting bio plastic to incendiary plastic
LanguageData.RSF_EcoLeatherRecipe.label: make eco leather
LanguageData.RSF_EcoLeatherRecipe.description: Synthetic leather from plant polymers. Sustainable alternative to animal leather for high-quality clothing.
LanguageData.RSF_EcoLeatherRecipe.jobString: converting plastic fiber to eco leather
LanguageData.RSF_DriedMeatRecipe.label: cook dried meat
LanguageData.RSF_DriedMeatRecipe.description: Preserve meat by drying it. The result tastes awful and gives mood penalties but lasts much longer without refrigeration. Better used as an ingredient in cooked meals than eaten directly.
LanguageData.RSF_DriedMeatRecipe.jobString: converting raw meat to dried meat
LanguageData.RSF_DriedFruitRecipe.label: cook dried fruit
LanguageData.RSF_DriedFruitRecipe.description: Preserve fruit by drying it. The result tastes awful and gives mood penalties but lasts much longer without refrigeration. Better used as an ingredient in cooked meals than eaten directly.
LanguageData.RSF_DriedFruitRecipe.jobString: converting raw fruit to dried fruit
LanguageData.RSF_DriedMeatRecipe4x.label: cook dried meat x4
LanguageData.RSF_DriedMeatRecipe4x.description: Preserve meat by drying it. The result tastes awful and gives mood penalties but lasts much longer without refrigeration. Better used as an ingredient in cooked meals than eaten directly.
LanguageData.RSF_DriedMeatRecipe4x.jobString: converting raw meat to dried meat
LanguageData.RSF_DriedFruitRecipe4x.label: cook dried fruit x4
LanguageData.RSF_DriedFruitRecipe4x.description: Preserve fruit by drying it. The result tastes awful and gives mood penalties but lasts much longer without refrigeration. Better used as an ingredient in cooked meals than eaten directly.
LanguageData.RSF_DriedFruitRecipe4x.jobString: converting raw fruit to dried fruit
LanguageData.RSF_FiberWoolRecipe.label: fiber wool
LanguageData.RSF_FiberWoolRecipe.description: Soft, light and provides very good insulation. plastic wool clothes can keep the body warm even in very cold conditions.
LanguageData.RSF_FiberArcticRecipe.label: fiber polar
LanguageData.RSF_FiberArcticRecipe.description: Soft, light and provides extreme insulation. ultra thermal wool clothes can keep the body warm even in extreme cold conditions.
LanguageData.RSF_FiberDesertRecipe.label: fiber desert
LanguageData.RSF_FiberDesertRecipe.description: Lightweight, breathable fabric designed for hot climates. Desert fiber clothing provides excellent ventilation while protecting against sun exposure and sand storms.
LanguageData.RSF_FiberSolarRecipe.label: fiber solar
LanguageData.RSF_FiberSolarRecipe.description: Advanced reflective composite that deflects intense solar radiation. Solar fiber garments offer maximum heat protection for extreme desert conditions and prolonged sun exposure.
